channel.title: SemanticKernel on Codewrecks
channel.description: Recent content in SemanticKernel on Codewrecks

item.title: Introductory video playlist about Semantic Kernel RC
item.description: Semantic Kernel reached Release Candidate and there are some breaking changes from the latest beta. For this reason I re-recorded a series of video I’ve planned a couple of week ago with all examples updated to RC3. Here is the list on my youtube channel: Semantic Kernel Playlist Call python function from C# - How you can call python code from C# to simplify interaction with LLM or other Models Using new Handlebar templates - How to interact with a LLM (GPT in this example) with classic chat mode Create plugins in C# - How to Create plugin in C# and call directly through kernel object AutoPluginInvoker capabilities - Let Semantic Kernel automatically invoke plugin if needed during your chat interaction with GPT All the videos are in my youtube channel.
